assigned.name: Engineering Career Research
assigned.description:
Here students will turn in their RESEARCH documents where they answered all the questions asked of them.
See attached Google Doc for instructions.

assigned.name: Homework - The Chicago Race Riots of 1919
assigned.description:
1. Read the 2 articles below. 

https://www.theworldwar.org/learn/about-wwi/red-summer

https://www.chicagohistory.org/the-murder-of-eugene-williams-and-a-racial-reckoning/

2. Write a paragraph about about The Red Summer / The Chicago Race Riots of 1919. Submit to the attached Google Doc. 
Below are topics to consider mentioning in the paragraph : 

-What began the riots? 
-What happened during the riots?
-What were the results / impacts of the riots?

missing.name: Understanding Science Survey - 10 mins
missing.description: Complete all the questions to the best of your knowledge.

missing.name: My Autobiography - Who Am I?
missing.description:
Write at least 5 PARAGRAPH essay describing yourself and your aspirations
- What's your nick name if any, favorite song, genre, movie, family, identity, cultural background, ethnicity, etc ...
- Your Science Journey - How do you see yourself as a scientist? What are your strengths and/or weaknesses/challenges in science?
- Integrate pictures of friends/family, pets etc that are part of your life and define your intersections.
- Create a Cover Page and include a picture of yourself on the cover.

missing.name: Architectural Lettering
missing.description:
Students will practice architectural lettering. They will have one class day to work on this. If not completed during class, students will have to complete the rest for homework. When completed students will scan/photograph their sheet and upload here. DO NOT RUSH THIS. Points will be deducted for rushed and poorly done work.
For A-Day drafting this will be due Wednesday, October 1. For B-Day drafting this will be due Thursday, October 2. Late submissions will not be accepted, if not handed in by due date students will receive a zero.

missing.name: Engineering 3D Model Project
missing.description:
Students will upload here: 
- Slideshow presentation
- 3D Brochure Model pictures
- Design sheet with sketches and ideas

See attached document for instructions.

missing.name: Harlem Poetry Project PPT
missing.description: Please attach/submit the PPT for your group here. Due Sunday 11:00pm.

missing.name: Author Background HW
missing.description:
Please research the background of the author of your group's selected poem. Take notes in your notebook about the author. You will use these notes to complete the group poetry project. Author Background - Information about the author/ when & where poem was written.

Additionally, finish annotating the poem in your yellow book if you have yet to do so. 

Optional : You may bring in your personal laptop or iPad to class since the school laptops are not always reliable.

missing.name: Homework - Harlem Renaissance article #1
missing.description:
Please read and annotate "A New African American Identity: The Harlem Renaissance." (can be found in the yellow booklet pages 6-8) Submit a typed google doc of the following : 

1) Submit a one paragraph summary of the reading.
3) Define the following key terms.
The Great Migration
The Harlem Renaissance 
Jim Crow Laws
